price: Wãncan ne Littãfi, bãbu shakka a cikinsa, shiriya ne ga mãsu taƙawa.*
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes: * Yã sifanta Littãfi; watau Alƙur'ãni da kamãla ya ce "Wancan" maimakon "Wannan" dõmin mãsu son su yi aiki da shi, su ne mãsu taƙawa. Taƙawa na da sharuɗɗa biyu, su ne ĩmãni da aiki da abin da manzancin Annabi Muhammadu ya ƙunsa. Sa'an nan mutãne a farkon Musulunci ko a inda Musulunci yake sãbo, sun kasu kashi huɗu. Kashi na farko sũ ne mãsu taƙawa waɗanda aka faɗi sifõfinsu a nan.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-kitābu lā rayba fīhi hudan lil'muttaqīna
